TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class ImportCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 导入 控件（或用作 控件的其他 ASP.NET 服务器控件）的描述文件，以便用户可以将具有预定义设置的此控件添加到网页上。

span.span: Imports a description file for a control (or other ASP.NET server control used as a control), so that users can add the control to a Web page with pre-defined settings.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用户能够导入说明文件，说明文件描述用户要 添加到区域的控件或服务器控件上的设置 。The control enables users to import a description file that describes settings on a control or server control that a user wants to add to a zone. 用户导入说明文件后，该 文件中引用的控件将显示在 控件中，用户可以将该控件添加到页面中。After a user imports a description file, the control referenced in the file appears within the control, and a user can add the control to the page. 说明文件与控件本身并不相同。The description file is not the same as the control itself. 它是以结尾的 XML 文件。WebPart 扩展和包含名称/值对（主要是用于描述控件状态的属性值）。It is an XML file that ends with a .WebPart extension and contains name/value pairs--mostly property values--that describe the state of the control. 根据指定的 XML 格式创建说明文件，如[Web 部件控件说明文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8)主题中所述。The description file is created according to a specified XML format, as described in the topic [Web Parts Control Description Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8). 对于说明文件所引用的控件，可以将其编译为程序集，也可以是在 .ascx 文件中定义的用户控件。As for the control that the description file refers to, it can either be compiled into an assembly, or it can be a user control defined in an .ascx file. 在这两种情况下，导入的说明文件中引用的控件必须位于承载试图导入控件的页面的 Web 服务器上。In either case, the control referenced in an imported description file must exist on the Web server that hosts the page that is attempting to import the control. 说明文件引用包含控件的控件名称和程序集 (或文件) ，说明文件包含影响控件属性值、外观和行为的设置。The description file references the control name and the assembly (or file) that contains the control, and the description file contains settings that affect the control's property values, appearance, and behavior. 控件使用户能够共享控件上的设置。The control enables users to share settings on controls. 复杂控件可以有许多属性和设置。A complex control can have many properties and settings. 例如，在大型公司内的典型 intranet 网站中，自定义 控件可能包含多个属性，这些属性保存特定于用户环境的值，例如其数据库连接、部门信息等。For example, in a typical intranet site within a large company, a custom control might contain a number of properties that hold values specific to the users' environment, such as their database connections, departmental information, and so on. 控件可能还包含许多影响其外观的属性。The control might also contain a number of properties that affect its appearance. 一位用户可以在特定站点上对控件进行个性化设置并使其正常工作，导出控件的描述文件，然后与其他用户共享说明文件，他们可以导入该文件以将完全配置的控件添加到允许他们进行个性化设置的其他 intranet 站点。One user could personalize the control on a particular site and get it working properly, export a description file for the control, and then share the description file with other users, who could import the file to add the fully configured control to other intranet sites that they are allowed to personalize. 只要包含控件的编译的程序集或用户控件文件存在于承载其站点的 Web 服务器上，用户就可以将该控件添加到其他网站。As long as the compiled assembly or user control file containing the control exists on the Web server that is hosting their site, users can add the control to other Web sites. 用户导入说明文件 (并因此将其关联的服务器控件) 到网页中的机制是 控件，页面开发人员必须将其添加到网页中。The mechanism by which users import a description file (and hence its associated server control) into a Web page is the control, which a page developer must add to a Web page. 当用户将页面切换到目录显示模式时， 控件将显示，用户可以通过用户此控件浏览到。对应于要导入的服务器控件的 WebPart 说明文件。When a user switches the page to catalog display mode, the control appears, and the user can user this control to browse to the .WebPart description file corresponding to the server control they want to import. 按照控件提供的 UI 和说明操作 ，用户可以将所需的服务器控件添加到网页中，其外观和属性完全按导入的说明文件中的指定进行配置。Following the UI and instructions provided by the control, a user is able to add the desired server control into the Web page, with its appearance and properties fully configured as specified in the imported description file. 在 可以导入控件的说明文件之前，用户必须先基于现有控件创建 (导出) 文件 。Before a control's description file can be imported, a user must first create (export) the file based on an existing control. 如果满足以下条件，则可以为控件导出说明文件：A description file can be exported for a control if the following conditions are met: - 控件包含用特性标记的属性 `Personalizable` 。The control has properties marked with the `Personalizable` attribute. - Web.config 文件的 `enableExport` 属性值在 `true` 元素上设置为 `` 。The Web.config file has the `enableExport` attribute value set to `true` on the `` element. - 开发人员将控件的属性值设置 为默认值以外的值 ，这将禁止导出。A developer sets the value of the property on the control to a value other than the default value of , which prohibits export. 如果 将属性值设置为 ， `Personalizable` 则当用户导出说明文件时，不会导出包含带有特性的参数的任何属性。If the property value is set to , any property that contains an parameter with a `Personalizable` attribute is not exported when a user exports a description file. 这样，控件开发人员就可以防止在某些情况下导出敏感数据（如连接字符串）。This enables control developers to prevent sensitive data, such as connection strings, from being exported in certain situations. 用户可以导出已启用导出的控件，方法是单击显示在控件的谓词菜单中的导出谓词，然后按照说明保存。控件的 WebPart 说明文件。A user can export a control that has been enabled for export by clicking the export verb that appears in the verbs menu of the control, and following the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 然后，其他用户可以导入此文件，以配置其自己的控件实例。Other users can then import this file to configure their own instances of the control. 类包含多个属性。The class contains several properties. 属性包含文本，其中包含用户浏览查找说明文件时的说明。The property contains text with instructions for users when they browse to locate the description file. 属性包含的文本用作导入的控件在控件中的标签 。The property contains text that serves as a label for the imported control as it appears within the control. 包含在导入控件说明时发生错误时显示的文本。The contains text that is displayed if an error occurs when a control description is being imported. 如果开发人员未指定标题，则属性将重写基属性以为控件分配默认标题。The property overrides the base property to assign a default title for an control if the developer does not assign a title. 属性包含用户单击以上传说明文件的按钮的文本， 属性包含上载过程的说明。The property contains the text for the button that the user clicks to upload the description file, and the property contains the instructions for the upload process. 类还包含几个唯一方法。The class also contains several unique methods. 方法 为目录中的每个控件检索一个对象 ，该对象使 控件可以显示有关每个服务器控件的信息，而无需创建该控件的实例。The method retrieves a object for each control in the catalog, which enables an control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of it. 方法 根据传递给方法的说明获取特定控件的实例。The method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. 使用控件有一些固有的风险 。There are some inherent risks associated with using the control. 例如，可能会通过用于导入的说明文件将恶意数据导入到 Web 应用程序。One example is the possibility of importing malicious data into your Web application through the description files used for importing. 如果有人在说明文件中放置了恶意脚本代码作为字符串属性的值，则当用户导入说明文件并将引用的服务器控件添加到网页时，可能会执行该脚本。If someone has placed malicious script code as the value of a string property in the description file, then that script could potentially be executed when a user imports the description file and adds the referenced server control to a Web page. 若要最大程度地降低导入包含恶意数据的说明文件的风险，具有字符串类型属性的服务器控件应始终对属性数据进行编码。To minimize the risk of importing description files with malicious data, server controls that have string-typed properties should always encode the property data. 另一个风险涉及通过说明文件导入类型 (参阅[Web 部件控件说明文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8)) 。Another risk involves importing types through description files (see [Web Parts Control Description Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8)). 恶意用户可能会提交将多个程序集加载到 中的请求，从而导致消耗大量内存。A malicious user could submit requests to load many assemblies into the , resulting in an excessive amount of memory being consumed. 若要避免与导入相关的风险，可以通过不使用导入功能或控件来完全禁用该功能 。To avoid the risks associated with import, you can disable the feature altogether by not using the import feature or the control. 也可以限制用户有权访问控件。Or you can limit what users have access to the control. 你可以使用角色管理以编程方式执行此操作 (参阅[使用角色) 管理授权](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/9ab2fxh0(v=vs.100))。You could do this programmatically, using role management (see [Managing Authorization Using Roles](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/9ab2fxh0(v=vs.100))). 例如，当加载页面时，你可以进行测试以查看用户是否属于特定角色，如 "管理员" 角色。For instance, when the page loads, you could test to see whether a user is in a certain role, such as the administrator role. 如果用户处于角色中，则可以通过编程方式将 控件添加到该用户的页面中。If the user is in the role, you could programmatically add the control to the page for that user. 你还可以使用声明性方法来限制可使用控件的用户组 。You could also use a declarative approach to limit the set of users that can use the control. 在包含目录的网页中，可以放置两个 控件：一个用于可导入的用户，一个用于无法导入的用户。Within your web page that contains a catalog, you could place two controls: one for users who can import, and one for those who cannot. 可以导入的用户的区域将包含 控件。The zone for users who can import would contain the control. 区域本身可以放置在 控件内，这使你可以将区域中的控件限制为仅限经过身份验证的用户或你指定的角色。The zone itself could be placed inside of a control, which would enable you to limit use of the control in the zone to only those authenticated users or roles that you specify. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上以声明方式和编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively and programmatically on a Web page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件和控件的网页 。A Web page that contains a control and an control. - 一个源代码文件，其中包含两个自定义 控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 应将以下源代码放置在文件中，并将其命名为 Displaymodemenucs 或 Displaymodemenuvb (具体取决于所使用的语言) 。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅[演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面顶部有两个 `register` 指令，一个用于用户控件，一个用于包含两个自定义控件的已编译组件 。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 请注意，该页具有对控件的声明性引用，该引用 嵌套在声明性元素的适当层次结构内。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 另请注意，在元素上以声明方式分配了多个属性值 `` 。Notice also that several property values are assigned declaratively on the `` element. 此外，该 `Button1_Click` 方法还会更新控件上的多个属性值 。Also, the `Button1_Click` method updates a number of property values on the control. 在该页的 控件中，将声明两个自定义 控件。In the page's control, the two custom controls are declared. ``控件 `exportmode="all"` 上有属性。The `` control has an `exportmode="all"` attribute on it. 此属性是使用户能够导出控件的描述文件所必需的，因此，要使用说明文件导入该控件的其他用户可以导入该文件。This attribute is required to enable users to export a description file for the control, which can then be imported by other users who wish to import the control using the description file. > [!NOTE] > 若要允许 Web 部件应用程序的用户导出控件的说明文件 ，还必须在 Web 应用程序中启用导出功能，方法 `enableExport="true"` 是将属性添加到元素中， `` (该元素是 `` Web.config 文件中) 元素的子元素。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 默认情况下，导出处于禁用状态，因此，如果尚未对应用程序启用导出功能，请编辑 Web.config 文件并立即执行此操作。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是这两个控件的源代码 。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 请注意，这些控件上的某些属性是用 `WebBrowsable` 特性标记的。Notice that some properties on these controls are marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 这使 控件可以动态生成用户界面 (UI) 以便用户在控件处于编辑模式时编辑这些属性。This enables the control to dynamically generate the user interface (UI) for a user to edit those properties when the controls are in edit mode. 属性也使用特性进行标记 `WebDisplayName` ，以指定显示在编辑 UI 中每个控件旁边的标签文本。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). `TextDisplayWebPart`使用元素在网页上引用名为的自定义控件 `` 。The custom control called `TextDisplayWebPart` is referenced on the Web page with an `` element. 另一控件（名 `UserInfoWebPart` 为）在最初也是在网页上声明的，尽管稍后会将其删除，以便演示为控件导入说明文件的能力。The other control, called `UserInfoWebPart`, is also declared on the Web page initially, though you will remove it later to demonstrate the ability to import a description file for a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 现在运行代码示例。Now run the code example. 在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一步是编辑 `UserInfoWebPart` 控件。The first step is to edit the `UserInfoWebPart` control. 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件并选择 "**编辑**"，将页面切换到编辑模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Edit** to switch the page to edit mode. 单击控件的谓词菜单 `UserInfoWebPart` (标题栏) 中的向下箭头，然后单击 "**编辑**"。Click the verbs menu of the `UserInfoWebPart` control (the downward arrow in the title bar), and then click **Edit**. 当编辑 UI 出现时，可以使用控件下方的几个编辑控件 `UserInfoWebPart` 来编辑其字段值。When the editing UI appears, several editing controls appear below the `UserInfoWebPart` control that you can use to edit its field values. 编辑某些字段，单击 **"确定**"，然后使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉方式将页面返回到浏览模式。Edit some fields, click **OK**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down to return the page to browse mode. 第二步是导出。控件的 WebPart 说明文件 `UserInfoWebPart` 。The second step is to export a .WebPart description file for the `UserInfoWebPart` control. 单击自定义控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 "**导出**"。Click the verbs menu on the custom control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 按照说明保存。控件的 WebPart 说明文件。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 现在关闭网页，并在编辑器中编辑页面源。Now close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 删除 `` 控件声明元素，然后保存并关闭该文件。Delete the `` control declaration element, then save and close the file. (你执行此步骤来模拟尚无控件的用户 `UserInfoWebPart` ，以便可以将控件导入到) 页面。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have the `UserInfoWebPart` control, so you can import the control to the page). 再次在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page again in a browser. `UserInfoWebPart`控件不应出现，因为已将其删除。The `UserInfoWebPart` control should not appear, because you removed it. 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件并选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在 控件中，单击 "**浏览**" 按钮，并浏览到。创建的 WebPart 文件，然后单击 "**上传**" 按钮。In the control, click the **Browse** button, and browse to the .WebPart file you created, then click the **Upload** button. 控件的引用应显示在旁边，旁边有一个复选框。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 选中该复选框，然后单击 "**添加**" 将控件添加到页面中。Select the check box, then click **Add** to add the control to the page. 在此页视图中，单击页面底部附近的 "**更新 ImportCatalogPart** " 按钮，查看以编程方式更新控件上的多个属性值的效果 。While you are in this view of the page, click the **Update ImportCatalogPart** button near the bottom of the page to see the effect of programmatically updating a number of property values on the control. 单击按钮后，观察 UI 中各个属性的更改方式。After clicking the button, observe how the various properties are changed in the UI. 最后，单击 "**关闭**" 以退出目录模式并将页面返回到浏览模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. `UserInfoWebPart`控件现在应显示在页面中，其中包含之前导出时的值。The `UserInfoWebPart` control should now appear in the page, containing the values that it had when you exported it earlier.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认构造函数; 类中没有声明任何构造函数 ，因此在创建类的新实例时，不会执行任何特殊任务。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 在内部使用构造函数来创建类的实例。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 通常无需 在自己的代码中以编程方式使用构造函数。Normally you will not need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控件的预期用途是使页面开发人员能够在设计时以声明方式将其添加到页面中。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一条文本消息，该消息指示用户浏览至一个说明文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a text message that instructs users to browse to the location of a description file.

value.span: 包含文本消息的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the message.

value.span: 默认值是一条由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的消息。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific message supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为用户提供了在添加导入控件的过程中必须执行的第一件事的简单概述：通过键入路径或浏览到文件来提供说明文件的位置。The property gives users a simple overview of the first thing they must do in the process of adding an imported control: provide the location of a description file, by either typing in a path or browsing to the file. 为此属性提供自定义值的一个典型原因是，如果您有用户的特殊说明（例如，他们要浏览到的特定网络共享来找到说明文件）。A typical reason to supply a custom value for this property is if you have special instructions for users, such as a specific network share to which they should browse to locate a description file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码和说明，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码部分中，请注意，将以 声明方式为控件设置属性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#2)] 在此代码段中， 属性值以编程方式分配。In this section of code, the property value is assigned programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#3)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件选择**目录模式**，然后将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to select **Catalog Mode** and switch the page to catalog mode. 在目录模式下页面和上传说明文件时，请注意在用户界面中显示的各种文本字符串 (UI) 控件。With the page in catalog mode and the description file uploaded, note the various text strings displayed in the user interface (UI) for the control. 如果单击 "**上传说明文件**" 按钮，则会更改 UI 中多个属性的文本，包括 属性文本。If you click the **Upload Description File** button, the text for several of the properties in the UI is changed, including the text for the property.

span.span: This property is not intended to be called from page developer code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的代码重写从类继承的基属性， 以在设计器中隐藏该属性，并防止其受主题影响。The code for this property overrides the base property inherited from the class to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes. 尽管该属性是公共的，但此属性由 Web 部件控件集在内部使用，用于呈现此控件的默认情况，而不应由页面开发人员使用。Though it is public, this property is used internally by the Web Parts control set for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be used by page developers. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 返回目录中可用 控件的说明的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available controls in a catalog.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含目录中每个控件的 。

span.span: A that contains a for each control in a catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为类中声明的抽象基方法提供实现 。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法返回目录中每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 请注意，在控件的情况下 ，一次只能有一个服务器控件在目录中，即使在有多个控件的情况下，该方法也会起作用。Note that in the case of an control, there can be only one server control in the catalog at a time, even though the method would work if there were multiple controls. 对象是一个对象，它包含有关控件的基本信息 ，包括控件的 ID、对控件的对象引用，以及从类继承的几个重要属性的值 ，例如 和 。A object is an object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法可提高性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录时，它需要一些有关它所包含的每个控件的信息，包括标题、描述、图标 (（如果存在）) 和 ID。When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 无需创建每个控件的实例即可获取此信息， 创建目录的区域将调用 方法，而调用仅返回控件的说明信息，而不是控件的实例。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method, and the call returns only the description information for the control rather than an instance of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method on a Web page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件和控件的网页 ，以及使用方法的代码 。A Web page that contains a control and an control, along with code that uses the method. - 一个源代码文件，其中包含两个自定义 控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 应将以下源代码放置在文件中，并将其命名为 Displaymodemenucs 或 Displaymodemenuvb (具体取决于所使用的语言) 。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅[演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面顶部有两个 `register` 指令，一个用于用户控件，一个用于包含两个自定义控件的已编译组件 。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 这两个控件在页的标记中以声明方式引用。Both of these controls are referenced declaratively in the markup of the page. 在对控件的声明性引用 (都以 `aspSample` 前缀) 开头，请注意，每个都有一个 `exportMode="all"` 添加到其中的属性。On the declarative references to the controls (both begin with an `aspSample` prefix), note that each has an `exportMode="all"` attribute added to it. 此特性使你能够导出。控件的 WebPart 说明文件，你将在后面的步骤中使用该文件将控件导入页。This attribute enables you to export a .WebPart description file for the control, which you will use in a later to step to import the control to a page. > [!NOTE] > 若要允许 Web 部件应用程序的用户导出控件的说明文件 ，还必须在 Web 应用程序中启用导出功能，方法 `enableExport="true"` 是将属性添加到元素中， `` (该元素是 `` Web.config 文件中) 元素的子元素。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 默认情况下，导出处于禁用状态，因此，如果尚未对应用程序启用导出功能，请编辑 Web.config 文件并立即执行此操作。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. 网页还具有对控件的声明性引用，该引用 嵌套在声明性元素的适当层次结构内。The Web page also has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 方法在方法的代码中调用 `Button1_Click` 。The method is called within the code for the `Button1_Click` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/ImportCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/ImportCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是这两个控件的源代码 。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 现在运行代码示例。Now run the code example. 在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一步是导出。用于控件) 的每个控件 (的 WebPart 说明文件 `TextDisplayWebPart` `UserInfoWebPart` 。The first step is export a .WebPart description file for each control (for the `TextDisplayWebPart` and for the `UserInfoWebPart` control). 对于每个控件，单击控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 "**导出**"。For each control, click the verbs menu on the control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 按照说明保存。控件的 WebPart 说明文件。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 为每个控件导出说明文件后，关闭网页，并在编辑器中编辑页面源。After you have exported a description file for each control, close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 删除 `` 和 `` 控件声明元素，然后保存并关闭文件。Delete the `` and the `` control declaration elements, then save and close the file. (你执行此步骤来模拟尚未获得这些控件的用户，以便可以将这些控件导入) 的页面。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have these controls, so you can import the controls to the page). 再次在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page again in a browser. 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件并选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在 控件中，单击 "**浏览**" 按钮，浏览到。创建的 Web 部件文件，选择一个，然后单击 "**上传**" 按钮。In the control, click the **Browse** button, browse to the .WebPart files you created, select one, then click the **Upload** button. 控件的引用应显示在旁边，旁边有一个复选框。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 选中该复选框，然后单击 "**添加**" 将控件添加到页面中。Select the check box, then click **Add** to add the control to the page. 为另一个控件重复此过程。Repeat this process for the other control. 在此页视图中，单击页面底部附近的 "**获取 WebPart 说明**" 按钮，查看以编程方式访问 控件中当前加载的控件说明的对象的效果 。While you are in this view of the page, click the **Get WebPart Description** button near the bottom of the page to see the effect of programmatically accessing the object for the control description currently loaded in the control. 用于访问说明详细信息的方法（在 `Button1_Click` 页源的方法中找到）是 方法。The method used to access the description details, found in the `Button1_Click` method of the page source, is the method. 按钮下面的标签显示有关控件的基本详细信息。A label below the button displays basic details about the control. 添加第一个控件后，重复该过程，将第二个控件添加到该页。After adding the first control, repeat the process to add the second control to the page. 最后，单击 "**关闭**" 以退出目录模式并将页面返回到浏览模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. 这两个自定义控件现在应显示在页面中，其中包含之前导出说明文件时的值。Both custom controls should now appear in the page, containing the values they had when you exported description files earlier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回对控件的引用， 其说明详细信息与传入方法的对象的值匹配 。The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 通常，此方法与方法一起使用 ，后者用于检索目录中的控件说明。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of controls in the catalog. 然后，可以通过将单个对象传递到方法，按需检索或操作各个控件 。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method on a Web page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件和控件的网页 ，以及使用方法的代码 。A Web page that contains a control and an control, along with code that uses the method. - 一个源代码文件，其中包含两个自定义 控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 应将以下源代码放置在文件中，并将其命名为 Displaymodemenucs 或 Displaymodemenuvb (具体取决于所使用的语言) 。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅[演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面顶部有两个 `register` 指令，一个用于用户控件，一个用于包含两个自定义控件的已编译组件 。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 这两个控件在页的标记中以声明方式引用。Both of these controls are referenced declaratively in the markup of the page. 在对控件的声明性引用 (都以 `aspSample` 前缀) 开头，请注意，每个都有一个 `exportMode="all"` 添加到其中的属性。On the declarative references to the controls (both begin with an `aspSample` prefix), note that each has an `exportMode="all"` attribute added to it. 此特性使你能够导出。控件的 WebPart 说明文件，你将在后面的步骤中使用该文件将控件导入页。This attribute enables you to export a .WebPart description file for the control, which you will use in a later to step to import the control to a page. > [!NOTE] > 若要允许 Web 部件应用程序的用户导出控件的说明文件 ，还必须在 Web 应用程序中启用导出功能，方法 `enableExport="true"` 是将属性添加到元素中， `` (该元素是 `` Web.config 文件中) 元素的子元素。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 默认情况下，导出处于禁用状态，因此，如果尚未对应用程序启用导出功能，请编辑 Web.config 文件并立即执行此操作。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. 网页还具有对控件的声明性引用，该引用 嵌套在声明性元素的适当层次结构内。The Web page also has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 方法在方法的代码中调用 `Button2_Click` 。The method is called within the code for the `Button2_Click` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/ImportCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/ImportCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是这两个控件的源代码 。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 现在运行代码示例。Now run the code example. 在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一步是导出。用于控件) 的每个控件 (的 WebPart 说明文件 `TextDisplayWebPart` `UserInfoWebPart` 。The first step is export a .WebPart description file for each control (for the `TextDisplayWebPart` and for the `UserInfoWebPart` control). 对于每个控件，单击控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 "**导出**"。For each control, click the verbs menu on the control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 按照说明保存。控件的 WebPart 说明文件。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 为每个控件导出说明文件后，关闭网页，并在编辑器中编辑页面源。After you have exported a description file for each control, close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 删除 `` 和 `` 控件声明元素，然后保存并关闭文件。Delete the `` and the `` control declaration elements, then save and close the file. (你执行此步骤来模拟尚未获得这些控件的用户，以便可以将这些控件导入) 的页面。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have these controls, so you can import the controls to the page). 再次在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page again in a browser. 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件并选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在 控件中，单击 "**浏览**" 按钮，浏览到。创建的 Web 部件文件，选择一个，然后单击 "**上传**" 按钮。In the control, click the **Browse** button, browse to the .WebPart files you created, select one, then click the **Upload** button. 控件的引用应显示在旁边，旁边有一个复选框。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 将控件说明上载到控件后，请 单击页面底部附近的 "**使用 GetWebPart** " 按钮。Now that the control description is uploaded to the control, click the **Use GetWebPart** button near the bottom of the page. 这将演示调用 方法并向其传递当前在控件中加载的控件说明的效果 。This will demonstrate the effect of calling the method and passing to it the control description currently loaded in the control. 请注意，会将关联的服务器控件立即添加到网页，而用户无需单击 "**添加**" 按钮。Note that the associated server control is added immediately to the Web page, without the user having to click the **Add** button. 方法（在 `Button2_Click` 页源的方法中调用）返回 与控件中加载的当前说明关联的控件 。The method, which is called in the `Button2_Click` method of the page source, returns the control associated with the current description that is loaded in the control. 接下来 ，调用方法，并将 控件直接添加到页面中。Next the method is called, and the control is directly added to the page. 此示例演示如何从控件以编程方式添加控件， 而无需用户干预。This demonstrates how to add a control programmatically from the control without user intervention. 添加第一个控件后，重复该过程，将第二个控件添加到该页。After adding the first control, repeat the process to add the second control to the page. 最后，单击 "**关闭**" 以退出目录模式并将页面返回到浏览模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. 这两个自定义控件现在应显示在页面中，其中包含之前导出说明文件时的值。Both custom controls should now appear in the page, containing the values they had when you exported description files earlier.

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户导入一个说明文件后显示的文本，该文本说明或描述导入控件目录中的相应导入控件。

span.span: Gets or sets text displayed after a user imports a description file to represent or describe the imported control within the catalog of imported controls.

value.span: 包含标签的文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the label.

value.span: 默认值是一条由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的消息。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific message supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于包含简短的常规标签，用于描述控件中包含的控件 。The property is typically used to contain a short, general label that describes the control contained in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码和说明，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码部分中，请注意，将以 声明方式为控件设置属性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#2)] 在此代码段中， 属性值以编程方式分配。In this section of code, the property value is assigned programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#3)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件选择**目录模式**，然后将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to select **Catalog Mode** and switch the page to catalog mode. 在目录模式下页面和上传说明文件时，请注意在用户界面中显示的各种文本字符串 (UI) 控件。With the page in catalog mode and the description file uploaded, note the various text strings displayed in the user interface (UI) for the control. 如果单击 "**上传说明文件**" 按钮，则会更改 UI 中多个属性的文本，包括 属性文本。If you click the **Upload Description File** button, the text for several of the properties in the UI is changed, including the text for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在目录模式中可见时，属性值显示在控件的标题栏中。The property value is displayed in the title bar of an control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 在页面中声明控件时，可以使用属性设置属性的值 `Title` 。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，则使用特定于区域性的默认值描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性类型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码和说明，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码部分中，请注意，将以 声明方式为控件设置属性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本，该控件初始化说明文件的上载。

span.span: Gets or sets the text for the control that initiates the upload of a description file.

value.span: 用作 的文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the text for a .

value.span: 该默认值是一个由 Web 部件控件集提供的、特定于区域性的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific string supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为 启动上载过程的控件提供文本。The property provides the text for the control that initiates the upload process. 如果为此属性分配自定义文本，或将其分配给 属性，则文本应清楚地表明用户正在上传说明文件。If you assign custom text to this property, or to the property, the text should make clear that the user is uploading a description file. 文本不应说，也不表示上载过程实际上载控件本身。The text should not say or imply that the upload process is actually uploading the control itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码和说明，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码部分中，请注意，将以 声明方式为控件设置属性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#2)] 在此代码段中， 属性值以编程方式分配。In this section of code, the property value is assigned programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#3)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件选择**目录模式**，然后将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to select **Catalog Mode** and switch the page to catalog mode. 在目录模式下页面和上传说明文件时，请注意在用户界面中显示的各种文本字符串 (UI) 控件。With the page in catalog mode and the description file uploaded, note the various text strings displayed in the user interface (UI) for the control. 如果单击 "**上传说明文件**" 按钮，则会更改 UI 中多个属性的文本，包括 属性文本。If you click the **Upload Description File** button, the text for several of the properties in the UI is changed, including the text for the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一条文本消息，该消息告诉用户如何上载说明文件。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the message that tells the user how to upload a description file.

value.span: 用作用户上载说明文件时的提示的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as instructions for the user to upload a description file.

value.span: 该默认值是一个由 Web 部件控件集提供的、特定于区域性的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific string supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为用户提供一个简短的句子或短语说明，告诉他们单击一个按钮上传说明文件。The property provides a brief sentence or phrase of instructions for users, telling them to click a button to upload the description file. 如果为此属性分配自定义文本，或将其分配给 属性，则文本应清楚地表明用户正在上传说明文件。If you assign custom text to this property, or to the property, the text should make clear that the user is uploading a description file. 文本不应说，也不表示上载过程实际上载控件本身。The text should not say or imply that the upload process is actually uploading the control itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码和说明，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码部分中，请注意，将以 声明方式为控件设置属性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control.
